Button.Name: RunButton

Checkbox.AutoTooltip: Follow them in Order or do Random?

Checkbox.name: Sprint Checkbox
Checkbox.AutoTooltip: From 1 to 100 % of Spring speed to use

Text.Name: MobLeveLText
Text.AutoTooltip: Number to add or Subtract from your level

Textentry.Name: MinLevelT
Textentry.AutoTooltip: Number to Subtract from your level

Textentry.Name: MaxLevelT
Textentry.AutoTooltip: Number to Add to your level

Textentry.Name: ConCheckT
Textentry.AutoTooltip: Number to Add to your level

Text.Name: MeleeRangeText
Text.AutoTooltip: Distance at which to use Melee Attacks

Text.Name: PullRangeText
Text.AutoTooltip: How close to get before using Pull attack

Text.Name: RangedText
Text.AutoTooltip: Will switch to Melee if closer than this

Text.Name: AllowedRoamingText
Text.AutoTooltip: How far off path to find mobs

checkbox.Name: UseForms
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Select which Form to stay in

checkbox.Name: CombatForms
checkbox.AutoTooltip: Change Forms based on Health in Combat

button.name: Port
button.AutoTooltip: Set Safe Teleport Location for emergency landing!

checkbox.Name: Say Alarm
checkbox.Text: Say/Emote Alarm with your Name in it
